#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	long long int t,n,i,j,k,l,sum;
	long long int a[89];
	i=0,j=1,k=1;
	for(l=0;l<89;l++)
	{
		a[l]=k;
		//cout<<k<<" ";
		i=j;j=k;k=i+j;
	}
	
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cout<<"A";
		
		if(n==1)
		{
			cout<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		
		else
		{
			for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
			{
				j=a[i]%26;
				if(j==0)
				{
					cout<<"Z";
				}
				else
				{
					cout<<char(64+j);
				}
				
				
			}
			
			cout<<"\n";
		}
	}
	
}
